title: Order 2020 (S.I. No. 447 of 2020)) and 100(3) and Rules 1(5) and 4(3) of Part 5
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Social Welfare (Consolidated
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Social Welfare (Consolidated 
Claims, Payments and Control) (Amendment) (No. 6) (Carer’s Benefit and 
Carer’s Allowance – Earnings Disregard) Regulations 2024. 

(2) These Regulations and the Social Welfare (Consolidated Claims, 
Payments and Control) Regulations 2007 to 2024 shall be construed together as 
one and may be cited together as the Social Welfare (Consolidated Claims, 
Payments and Control) Regulations 2007 to 2024. 

Definitions
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited social welfare (consolidated claim payment control) (amendment) (no 6) (carer benefit carer allowance - earnings disregard) regulation 2024 (2) regulation social welfare (consolidated claim payment control) regulation 2007 2024 shall construed together one may cited together social welfare (consolidated claim payment control) regulation 2007 2024 definition

title: Order 2020 (S.I. No. 447 of 2020)) and 100(3) and Rules 1(5) and 4(3) of Part 5
heading: In these Regulations—
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations— 

“Principal Regulations” means the Social Welfare (Consolidated Claims, 
Payments and Control) Regulations 2007; 

“Regulations of 2021” means the Social Welfare (Consolidated Claims, 
Payments and Control) (Amendment) (No. 17) (Earnings Disregard) 
Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 783 of 2021)). 

Commencement

title: Order 2020 (S.I. No. 447 of 2020)) and 100(3) and Rules 1(5) and 4(3) of Part 5
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations provide for increases in the earnings disregards, applicable 
to Carer’s Benefit and Carer’s Allowance, which form part of the Budget 
measures announced on 10 October 2023. 

In the case of Carer’s Benefit, the weekly earnings limit is being increased from 
€350.00 to €450.00 per week with effect from 6 June 2024. 

In the case of Carer’s Allowance, the weekly means disregard is being increased 
from €350.00 to €450.00 for a single person and from €750.00 to €900.00 for a 
couple. The increases in the disregard will take effect from 6 June 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [275] 5
